content.title: Introduction to Lumen AI
paragraphs: Lumen AI illuminates your digital world with AI at your fingertips. It provides instant access to AI capabilities from anywhere on your screen, without switching applications or context.
With a simple keyboard shortcut, you can interact with any AI model directly from your current workspace, making AI assistance seamlessly integrated into your workflow.

content.title: Installing Lumen AI
content.description: Getting started with Lumen AI is simple. Follow these steps to install the application on your system:

sections.title: macOS Installation
items: Download the latest Lumen.dmg file from our website
Open the DMG file and drag Lumen to your Applications folder
Launch Lumen from your Applications folder
If prompted, allow accessibility permissions for keyboard shortcuts

sections.title: Windows Installation
items: Download the Lumen Setup.exe from our website
Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions
Launch Lumen from the Start menu or desktop shortcut

sections.title: System Requirements
items: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or higher
Windows 10 or higher
Minimum 4GB RAM (8GB recommended)
500MB free disk space
Internet connection for API-based models

content.title: Quick Start Guide
content.description: Lumen AI is designed to be simple and intuitive. Here's how to get started immediately:

sections.title: Basic Usage
items: Press the keyboard shortcut (Cmd+L on macOS, Ctrl+L on Windows) from any application
Type your prompt or question in the popup window
Press Enter to get the AI response
Click outside the popup or press Escape to dismiss it

sections.title: Using with Selected Text
items: Select text in any application
Press the keyboard shortcut (Cmd+L/Ctrl+L)
The selected text will automatically appear in the prompt
Add instructions for what you want the AI to do with the text
To replace the selected text with the AI response, press Cmd+Return (macOS) or Ctrl+Enter (Windows)

content.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
content.description: Lumen AI is designed for keyboard-first interaction, allowing you to stay in your workflow.

content.title: Text Selection & Replacement
paragraphs: Lumen AI intelligently works with text you select in any application, making it powerful for editing, refining, or generating content.

sections.title: Auto-detection of Selected Text
items: Automatically captures selected text when you trigger the shortcut
Works across virtually all applications including text editors, browsers, and office applications
Supports formatted text, code snippets, and plain text

sections.title: Text Replacement
items: Replace selected text with AI-generated content in most editable fields
Perfect for rewriting, improving, or transforming existing text
Use Cmd+Return (macOS) or Ctrl+Enter (Windows) to apply the replacement

sections.title: Common Use Cases
items: Rewrite a paragraph to be more concise or formal
Fix grammar and spelling errors in selected text
Translate selected text to another language
Explain or improve code snippets
Generate a response to an email

content.title: Connecting AI Models
paragraphs: Lumen AI supports both local and cloud-based AI models, giving you flexibility based on your needs for privacy, performance, and capabilities.

sections.title: Local Models with Ollama
items: Run AI completely locally for privacy and offline use
Compatible with all models supported by Ollama
No API keys or subscriptions required
Navigate to Settings → AI Models → Local Models to configure

sections.title: Cloud API Models
items: Connect to powerful cloud-based models for enhanced capabilities
Supports OpenAI (GPT models), Anthropic (Claude), Google (Gemini), and others
Requires API keys from respective providers
Set up in Settings → AI Models → Cloud Models

sections.title: Switching Between Models
items: Quickly switch active models from the dropdown in the popup interface
Set default models for different types of tasks
Create model presets with different parameters for specialized tasks

content.title: Model Settings & Parameters
content.description: Fine-tune how your AI models respond with customizable parameters:

sections.title: Temperature
items: Controls response creativity and randomness
Lower values (0.1-0.5): More deterministic, factual responses
Higher values (0.7-1.0): More creative, varied outputs
Adjust in Settings → AI Models → Parameters

sections.title: Context Length
items: Determines how much conversation history the model considers
Longer context enables more coherent multi-turn interactions
Adjust based on your needs and model capabilities

sections.title: System Prompts
items: Define default instructions for your AI models
Create specialized prompts for different tasks (coding, writing, analysis)
Configure in Settings → AI Models → System Prompts

sections.alertContent: For most editing and writing tasks, a lower temperature (0.3-0.5) usually provides more consistent results. For creative tasks, try higher values.

content.title: Appearance & Behavior
content.description: Customize how Lumen AI looks and behaves to match your workflow:

sections.title: Popup Position
items: Center: Default position in the middle of the screen
Near Cursor: Appears close to your mouse position
Fixed Position: Always appears in a designated screen location
Configure in Settings → Appearance → Popup Position

sections.title: Theme Options
items: System: Follows your system light/dark preference
Light: Clean, bright interface
Dark: Reduced eye strain in low-light environments
Custom: Create your own color scheme

sections.title: Size & Opacity
items: Adjust popup size to balance screen real estate and readability
Configure transparency to see content behind the popup
Set in Settings → Appearance → Size & Opacity

content.title: Custom Keyboard Shortcuts
content.description: Personalize keyboard shortcuts to fit your workflow:

sections.title: Modifying Shortcuts
items: Open Settings → Keyboard Shortcuts
Find the action you want to customize
Click to edit and press your desired key combination
Save changes

sections.title: Shortcut Conflicts
items: The system will warn you about potential conflicts with existing shortcuts
Some applications may override global shortcuts
Use modifier keys (Alt, Shift) with standard shortcuts to avoid conflicts

sections.alertContent: Custom shortcuts may require re-authorizing accessibility permissions. Follow the prompts if asked to grant permissions after changing shortcuts.

content.title: Custom Workflows
paragraphs: Create specialized AI workflows for repeated tasks to save time and ensure consistent results.

sections.title: Creating a Workflow
items: Go to Settings → Workflows → Create New
Name your workflow (e.g., "Email Response", "Code Refactor")
Select the AI model to use
Create a template prompt with placeholders for selected text
Optionally assign a dedicated shortcut

sections.title: Example Workflows
items: Grammar Check: Fix spelling and grammar in selected text
Summarize: Create a concise summary of selected content
Explain Code: Generate an explanation of selected code
Translate: Convert selected text to another language
Format Email: Professionalize an email draft

sections.title: Using Workflows
items: Select text and use the workflow's custom shortcut
Or open Lumen AI and select from the Workflows dropdown
The workflow will process your selected text with the predefined prompt

sections.title: Shortcut Not Working
items: Check if accessibility permissions are granted in System Preferences/Settings
Verify the shortcut isn't being overridden by another application
Try restarting Lumen AI or your computer
Reinstall the app if permissions seem correct but issues persist

sections.title: Text Selection Issues
items: Some applications use non-standard text fields that may not work with auto-detection
Try copying text to clipboard before invoking Lumen AI
For web applications, ensure the browser extension is installed if available

sections.title: AI Model Connection Problems
items: For local models: Ensure Ollama is running and the model is downloaded
For cloud models: Verify your API key is correct and has sufficient quota
Check your internet connection for cloud-based models
Try switching to a different model to isolate the issue

sections.title: Performance Issues
items: Local models: Consider using smaller models if responses are slow
Reduce the context length for faster responses
Close other resource-intensive applications
For cloud models: Check your internet connection speed

sections.title: Viewing Logs
items: Open Settings → Advanced → View Logs
Look for error messages related to your issue
Filter logs by severity or component

sections.title: Resetting Settings
items: Reset all settings: Settings → Advanced → Reset All Settings
Reset specific settings: Navigate to the relevant settings section and use the reset option
Note that this will remove custom shortcuts and workflows

sections.title: Cleaning Cache
items: Clear conversation history: Settings → Advanced → Clear History
Remove temporary files: Settings → Advanced → Clean Cache
This can help resolve performance issues or strange behavior

sections.alertContent: If you continue experiencing issues, visit our support forum or submit a bug report with your logs attached for more personalized assistance.
